name: Sno'clock
description:
A survival roguelike game inspired by The Long Dark.

Note: The game is over-scoped and we couldn't complete the game in time. So, I submit this game as incomplete and some features may not be fully functional. There is no game over and no ending for now. Needs also won't work properly. However, you can freely spend time exploring the world and interacting with some objects.

Features:

  • Time, weather and temperature system
  • Harvesting (trees/shrubs/containers, etc.)
  • Hunting wild animals
  • Item crafting

Credits:

  • Guuuuuum - Design
  • scarf - Art
  • Maru(underww) - Programming
